testcase.name: User should be able to login successfully with valid credentials.
testcase.classname: Validate login functionality of Orangle HRM application
testcase.system-out: Scenario: User should be able to login successfully with valid credentials. # file:///G:/2025/My%20Automation%20Project/CucumberJavaSeleniumProject/src/test/resources/Features/OrangeHRMLogin.feature:3 âœ… Browser launched and navigated to login page. âœ” Given Browser opens and user is on the login page of OrangeHRM # StepDefinitions.OrangeHRMLoginSteps.browser_opens_and_user_is_on_the_login_page_of_orange_hrm() âœ” When User enters valid username and password # StepDefinitions.OrangeHRMLoginSteps.user_enters_valid_username_and_password() âœ” And Click on login button # StepDefinitions.OrangeHRMLoginSteps.click_on_login_button() User logged in & Dashboard page is displayed. âœ” Then User should be logged in and lands in dashboard page # StepDefinitions.OrangeHRMLoginSteps.user_should_be_logged_in_and_lands_in_dashboard_page() âœ” And Logout from application # StepDefinitions.OrangeHRMLoginSteps.logout_from_application() âœ… Browser closed successfully.

testcase.name: Authenticate user with valid credentials using POM
